title: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7 vs HP Spectre x360: Which is better?
content:
Lenovo’s ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7 is the latest in the company’s lineup of business convertibles, and it’s a great laptop at that. The new model comes with Intel’s 12th-generation processors, specifically from the P series, with 28W of base power and a hybrid architecture that allows for a lot more cores to be packed

The post Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7 vs HP Spectre x360: Which is better? appeared first on XDA.
description: Wondering whether you should buy the new Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga or the HP Spectre x360? Here's what you need to know about them.
